title: 178. Manna CEO interview | Drone Delivery As a Service
description:
Manna Drone Delivery is making 3-minute air delivery a reality, whether you want food, medicine or anything you need in your local community. Using custom-developed aerospace grade drones, they deliver directly from restaurants and centralized kitchens to consumer's homes. Manna drones fly at an altitude of 80 meters and a speed of over 80kph - delivering within a 2km radius in less than 3 minutes.â€‹ They're reducing delivery times to a fraction of their current times, greatly improving the consumer experience of food delivery, and saving lives as they take the dangerous process of road-based delivery into the skies.

Guest: Bobby Healy, CEO & Founder - Manna
Manna website âœ http://bit.ly/MannaDrones
